Title: Silence of the Lambs
Description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: Thriller film, also known as suspense film or suspense thriller, is a broad film genre that involves excitement and suspense in the audience.

Director.Name: Jonathan Demme
Director.Bio: Robert Jonathan Demme was an American director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
Description: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Professor Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

Genre.Name: Adventure
Genre.Description: An adventure story is about a protagonist who journeys to epic or distant places to accomplish something.

Director.Name: Steven Spielberg
Director.Bio: Steven Spielberg is Hollywood's best known director and one of the wealthiest filmmakers in the world.

Title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
Description: In 1935, Indiana Jones arrives in India, still part of the British Empire, and is asked to find a mystical stone. He then stumbles upon a secret cult committing enslavement and human sacrifices in the catacombs of an ancient palace.

Genre.Name: Adventure
Genre.Description: An adventure story is about a protagonist who journeys to epic or distant places to accomplish something.

Director.Name: Steven Spielberg
Director.Bio: Steven Spielberg is Hollywood's best known director and one of the wealthiest filmmakers in the world.

Title: Avatar
Description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

Genre.Name: Adventure
Genre.Description: An adventure story is about a protagonist who journeys to epic or distant places to accomplish something.

Director.Name: James Cameron
Director.Bio: James Cameron is Canadian and is now one of the most sought-after directors in Hollywood.

Title: Titanic
Description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

Genre.Name: Romance
Genre.Description: Romance is understood to be "love stories", emotion-driven stories that are primarily focused on the relationship between the main characters of the story.

Director.Name: James Cameron
Director.Bio: James Cameron is Canadian and is now one of the most sought-after directors in Hollywood.

Title: The Terminator
Description: Take on the role of Kyle Reese and his quest to save Sarah Connor from termination.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: Thriller film, also known as suspense film or suspense thriller, is a broad film genre that involves excitement and suspense in the audience.

Director.Name: Julian LeFay
Director.Bio: Julian LeFay was born on October 30, 1965 in Denmark as Benni Jensen. He is known for his work on The Terminator (1991), The Terminator 2029 (1992) and The Elder Scrolls II: Daggerfall (1996).

Title: The Bridges of Madison County
Description: Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson for four days in the 1960s.

Genre.Name: Romance
Genre.Description: Romance is understood to be "love stories", emotion-driven stories that are primarily focused on the relationship between the main characters of the story.

Director.Name: Clint Eastwood
Director.Bio: Eastwood's big-screen breakthrough came as The Man with No Name in Sergio Leone's trilogy of excellent spaghetti westerns: A Fistful of Dollars (1964), For a Few Dollars More (1965), and The Good, the Bad and the Ugly (1966).

Title: Sanctum
Description: An underwater cave diving team experiences a life-threatening crisis during an expedition to the unexplored and least accessible cave system in the world.

Genre.Name: Adventure
Genre.Description: An adventure story is about a protagonist who journeys to epic or distant places to accomplish something.

Director.Name: Alister Grierson
Director.Bio: Alister Grierson is a director and writer, known for Bloody Hell (2020), Sanctum (2011) and Kokoda: 39th Battalion (2006).

Title: The Terminal
Description: An Eastern European tourist unexpectedly finds himself stranded in JFK airport, and must take up temporary residence there.

Genre.Name: Comedy
Genre.Description: Comedy is a story that tells about a series of funny, or comical events, intended to make the audience laugh.

Director.Name: Steven Spielberg
Director.Bio: Steven Spielberg is Hollywood's best known director and one of the wealthiest filmmakers in the world.

Title: This is 40
Description: This is about a married couple, Pete and Debbie, who are both about to turn 40, their kids hate each other, both of their businesses are failing, they're on the verge of losing their house, and their relationship is threatening to fall apart.

Genre.Name: Comedy
Genre.Description: Comedy is a story that tells about a series of funny, or comical events, intended to make the audience laugh.

Director.Name: Judd Apatow
Director.Bio: He is a producer and writer, known for Girls (2012), Knocked Up (2007) and The 40-Year-Old Virgin (2005).
